Effect: Earth Impulse Junction.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Earth Impulse Junction.name: Effect: Earth Impulse Junction

Effect: Energetic Meltdown.description:
As you channel energy through your deviant abilities, some of it turns back on you, spiking your body temperature or dancing across your skin.

Mild Backlash You take [[/r @actor.level]]{damage equal to your level} as energy scours your body.

Moderate Backlash Energy wracks your body. After taking the damage, you gain weakness to the energy type of your backlash until your next daily preparations. The weakness is equal to one-third of your level. You also lose immunity to the energy type if you had it, until your next daily preparations.

Severe Backlash Whatever furnace or well within you that provides the energy for your deviation overloads completely, cascading out of you in an uncontrolled burst. You deal [[/r (@actor.level)d6]]{1d6 damage per level} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save. You automatically take full damage without attempting a save.
Effect: Energetic Meltdown.name: Effect: Energetic Meltdown

Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.
Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Effect: Juvenile Flight

Effect: Victorious Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Victorious Vigor.name: Effect: Victorious Vigor

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)

Effect: Aura of Preservation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura Of Preservation}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.
Effect: Aura of Preservation.name: Effect: Aura of Preservation

Effect: Harrow-Chosen.description:
This benefit is determined by alignment of the card you draw from the deck. The card can match both alignment components with yours (true match), match a single alignment component with yours (partial match), have no matching alignment components (unmatched), or have a diametrically opposed alignment to yours (misaligned).

True match: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to a saving throw of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) for 1 minute.

Partial match: You gain resistance to one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) equal to your level for 1 minute.

Unmatched: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. The temporary Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Misaligned: You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to your Speeds for 1 minute.
Effect: Harrow-Chosen.name: Effect: Harrow-Chosen

Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.
Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.name: Stance: Monastic Archer Stance

Effect: Overdrive.description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.
Effect: Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 sonic damage, or an extra 1d6 sonic damage if you have a domain spell with the sonic trait.
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)

Effect: Accept Echo.description:
While in this state, you become trained in the weapon you chose and an expert in the skill you chose. Additionally, while you're in this state, the echo can speak and interact with the Material Plane using your body, and you gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects, as the possessing spirit protects you from other possessions.

This state lasts for 10 minutes, after which the echo disappears completely until the next time you make your daily preparations. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this effect.

At 7th level you become a master of the skill you chose, at 13th level you become an expert with the weapon you chose, and at 15th level you become legendary with the skill you chose.
Effect: Accept Echo.name: Effect: Accept Echo

Stance: Thermal Nimbus.description: Choose cold or fire. You and allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance equal to your level to damage of that type.
Stance: Thermal Nimbus.name: Stance: Thermal Nimbus

Effect: Spiral Sworn.description: For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the level of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.
Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: Effect: Spiral Sworn

Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.T5xFirAE8VLL5Lbu]{Smite Good}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 evil damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.
Effect: Smite Good.name: Effect: Smite Good

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)

Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.
Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.name: Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb

Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Battle Medicine from that person for the duration.
Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.name: Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity

Stance: Twinned Defense.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xjLbabfyQzBNT4y1]{Twinned Defense (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kTRGAST9J9ZxJZ4A]{Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)}

Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} action.
Stance: Twinned Defense.name: Stance: Twinned Defense

Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).description: Elemental energy surrounds you. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.
Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self)

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance

Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.
Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Effect: Tiller's Drive

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success)

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry

Effect: Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.
Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Effect: Hungry Goblin

Effect: Bristle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Bristle.name: Effect: Bristle

Effect: Catfolk Dance.description: The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves
Effect: Catfolk Dance.name: Effect: Catfolk Dance

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Eye of the Arclords}.

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: Effect: Eye of the Arclords

Effect: Primal Aegis.description: You and allies within 30 feet of you gain resistance equal to your Wisdom modifier to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, and positive damage.
Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Effect: Primal Aegis

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 cold damage, or an extra 1d6 cold damage if you have a domain spell with the cold trait.
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)

Effect: Goblin Song (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.
Effect: Goblin Song (Success).name: Effect: Goblin Song (Success)

Effect: Saoc Astrology.description: This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.
Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Effect: Saoc Astrology

Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}

Requirements You're unarmored and wielding a simple firearm, bayonet, or reinforced stock

Effect You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of simple firearms. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using bayonets, reinforced stocks, and simple firearms. You can use Flurry of Blows with these weapons. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with bayonets and reinforced stocks, so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike. You can also use them with simple firearms when attacking within half the first range increment.
Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.name: Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance

Stance: Paragon's Guard.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hPDerDCYmag3s0dP]{Paragon's Guard}.

Requirements You are wielding a shield

Once you've had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

While you are in this stance, you constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.
Stance: Paragon's Guard.name: Stance: Paragon's Guard

Effect: Hag Blood Magic.description: Spiteful curses punish your foes. The first creature that deals damage to you before the end of your next turn takes 2 mental damage per spell level and must attempt a basic Will save.
Effect: Hag Blood Magic.name: Effect: Hag Blood Magic

Effect: Curse of Living Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.IaxmCkdsPlA52spu]{Bones}

Curse of Living Death

Your body is slowly decaying even though you are alive, and using your powers furthers this unnatural living death. You carry a touch of the grave about you, manifesting as bloodless pallor, a faint smell of earth, or deathly cold skin.

Minor Curse

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

Moderate Curse

Your dead flesh continues to rot, affecting your health. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and this drained condition is cumulative with any other drained conditions you gain. This drained condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the drained condition reduce your drained condition to drained 1 instead.

In addition, you gain resistance to poison equal to half your level. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against diseases, poisons, and death effects, and if you roll a success on such a save, you get a critical success instead.

Major Curse (11th)

You stand just steps from the grave. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. This wounded condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the wounded condition reduce your wounded condition to wounded 1 instead.

When you would attempt a recovery check, you can choose to get an automatic success instead of rolling, and if you roll a critical failure on a save against a disease, poison, or death effect, you get a failure instead.
Effect: Curse of Living Death.name: Effect: Curse of Living Death

Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.description: You have mastered the opening steps to the Masquerade of Seasons, a dance that channels the power of spring, summer, winter, and autumn. Choose one of the following traits: water, fire, negative, or cold. You gain resistance 5 to damage dealt by effects with the chosen trait. You can use an action to reenter this stance at any time, changing the granted resistance to another of the available options. If you are at least 12th level, the granted resistance increases to be equal to half your level.
Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.name: Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance

Effect: Giant's Stature.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.W21jKAcG0GtEtBiK]{Giant's Stature}

You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} condition until you stop raging
Effect: Giant's Stature.name: Effect: Giant's Stature

Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{Didactic Strike}.

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.
Effect: Didactic Strike.name: Effect: Didactic Strike

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description: The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)

Effect: Stone Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgg9eNF6MsJPMjyH]{Stone Body}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.
Effect: Stone Body.name: Effect: Stone Body

Effect: Distracting Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hLYoIjH8gPEVXyWG]{Distracting Feint}

While a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.
Effect: Distracting Feint.name: Effect: Distracting Feint

Effect: Purifying Breeze.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.
Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Effect: Purifying Breeze

Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.
Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery

Effect: Energize Wings.description: You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.
Effect: Energize Wings.name: Effect: Energize Wings

Effect: Unleash Psyche.description: When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's level. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.
Effect: Unleash Psyche.name: Effect: Unleash Psyche

Effect: Deteriorated.description:
Associated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZR5Buon23cDQ1ryB]{Zombie Dedication}.

While your body is deteriorated, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. You can spend 10 minutes checking and repairing your joints and other weak parts of your body to recover from deterioration. You can perform these repairs as part of your daily preparations. Because it's a natural result of your body's functions, you can't remove the slowed condition from deterioration through any other means.
Effect: Deteriorated.name: Effect: Deteriorated

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self)

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uv235v6hXCITAFej]{Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)

Stance: Point-Blank Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point-Blank Shot}.

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.
Stance: Point-Blank Shot.name: Stance: Point-Blank Shot

Effect: Ceremony of Protection.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Ceremony of Protection.name: Effect: Ceremony of Protection

Effect: Watchful Gaze.description: You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.
Effect: Watchful Gaze.name: Effect: Watchful Gaze

Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you critically hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their roll.
Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).name: Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit)

Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.
Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil)

Effect: Aldori Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NZgjqVV2HYzLCvvA]{Aldori Parry}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Aldori Parry.name: Effect: Aldori Parry

Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.
Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs

Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.
Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Effect: Overwatch Field

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self).description: The corruption of sin makes you more imposing. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self)

Effect: Smite Evil.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite Evil}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes with the weapon your blade ally inhabits against that foe deal an extra 4 good damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the foe attacks one of your allies, the duration extends to the end of that foe's next turn. If the foe continues to attack your allies each turn, the duration continues to extend.
Effect: Smite Evil.name: Effect: Smite Evil

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.name: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Warden

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)

Stance: Wolf Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AN9jY1JVcU20Qdw6]{Wolf Stance}

You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth. You can make wolf jaw unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

If you're flanking a target while in Wolf Stance, your wolf jaw unarmed attacks also gain the trip trait.
Stance: Wolf Stance.name: Stance: Wolf Stance

Effect: Great Tengu Form.description:
Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}.

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.
Effect: Great Tengu Form.name: Effect: Great Tengu Form

Stance: Stumbling Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}

You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements. While in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}.

The only Strikes you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits. If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes off-guard against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.
Stance: Stumbling Stance.name: Stance: Stumbling Stance

Effect: Heroes' Call.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.
Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Effect: Heroes' Call

Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.
Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).name: Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success)

Effect: Necrotic Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6erzXaxxvcXYnL9H]{Necrotic Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to restore Hit Points to a single undead creature, the target then deals an additional 1d6 negative damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the harm spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the harm spell is at least 8th level, the damage increases to 3d6.
Effect: Necrotic Infusion.name: Effect: Necrotic Infusion

Effect: Replenishment of War.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Replenishment of War.name: Effect: Replenishment of War

Effect: Align Armament (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.
Effect: Align Armament (Good).name: Effect: Align Armament (Good)

Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.
Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure)

Stance: Sea Glass Guardians.description:
Eerily beautiful elemental water beings race around you, eager to protect and heal you and your allies. Their forms vary and might include eels formed of undulating water or ice crystals whirling in the shape of a jellyfish. The guardians flow around combatants and don't occupy a space. They attempt to intercept all dangers, granting you and your allies within your kinetic aura a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

If any creature affected is critically hit or critically fails at a saving throw against an attack, effect from an enemy, or hazard and remains above 0 HP, the guardians reach out to heal that creature. The creature regains 4d8+8 HP, and the impulse ends. If the creature is in water, the healing dice are d10s instead of d8s.

Level (+3) The healing increases by 1d8+4.

[[/r ((floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)+4)d8+(floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)*4+8))[healing]]]{Leveled HP}
Stance: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Stance: Sea Glass Guardians

Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.
Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.name: Effect: Accursed Clay Fist

Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.description: The creature gains a status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.
Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Effect: Kindle Inner Flames

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Improved Poison Weapon

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description: The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 positive damage.
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon

Stance: Cobra Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.
Stance: Cobra Stance.name: Stance: Cobra Stance

Effect: Radiant Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Radiant Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} to restore Hit Points to a single living creature, the target deals an additional 1d6 positive damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, or 3d6 if the spell is at least 8th level.
Effect: Radiant Infusion.name: Effect: Radiant Infusion

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)

Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.
Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Effect: Prevailing Position

Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}

Your jagged blows are like lightning. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits. While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.
Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.name: Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance

Effect: Encroaching Presence.description:
Seeing and touching the beyond leaves you open to its alien influence, warping your perceptions and thoughts.

Mild Backlash Something inexplicable touches your mind, leaving you with lingering horror. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Moderate Backlash Disorienting visions and figments cover your vision, as if you're seeing through another set of alien senses. For 10 minutes, all creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you as they are covered in visual distortions only you can see.

Severe Backlash Your life force is siphoned away as the presence tugs your soul to wherever it resides. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until your next daily preparations.
Effect: Encroaching Presence.name: Effect: Encroaching Presence

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower Level)

Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

You are distracted and takes a -3 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.
Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).name: Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success)

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)

Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.
Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Effect: Shared Clarity

Effect: Recall Under Pressure.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws for the remainder of the combat encounter as your morale soars or a +2 status bonus if the card you drew was from the suit of Books.
Effect: Recall Under Pressure.name: Effect: Recall Under Pressure

Effect: Champion's Resistance.description: The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level.
Effect: Champion's Resistance.name: Effect: Champion's Resistance

Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}
Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Effect: Psychic Rapport

Effect: Current Spell (Water).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the water trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the water trait.

This effect has the water trait.
Effect: Current Spell (Water).name: Effect: Current Spell (Water)

Effect: Emotional Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8DI7wLxtUy99g9K]{Emotional Surge}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.
Effect: Emotional Surge.name: Effect: Emotional Surge

Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.
Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Good)

Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Known Weaknesses}.

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Known Weakness.name: Effect: Known Weakness

Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.
Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Effect: Rampaging Form

Effect: Perfect Resistance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.
Effect: Perfect Resistance.name: Effect: Perfect Resistance

Effect: Undying Conviction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}

Undead creatures gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist positive damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.
Effect: Undying Conviction.name: Effect: Undying Conviction

Effect: Bespell Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a conjuration or transmution spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 damage.
Effect: Bespell Weapon.name: Effect: Bespell Weapon

Effect: Align Armament (Evil).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.
Effect: Align Armament (Evil).name: Effect: Align Armament (Evil)

Stance: Geologic Attunement.description:
You gain tremorsense (imprecise) in your kinetic aura.

At 13th level this becomes precise tremorsense.
Stance: Geologic Attunement.name: Stance: Geologic Attunement

Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{Deadly Poison Weapon}.
Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)

Stance: Wild Winds Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{Wild Winds Stance}

You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance.

You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.
Stance: Wild Winds Stance.name: Stance: Wild Winds Stance

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Effect: Mountain Stronghold

Effect: Methodical Debilitations.description: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.
Effect: Methodical Debilitations.name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations

Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).description: Strikes with the chosen weapon or unarmed attack deal an additional 1d6 damage of a type matching the energy you consumed.
Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).name: Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike)

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Animate Dead}.
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Effect: Reanimator Dedication

Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.
Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance

Effect: Hamstringing Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]{Hamstringing Strike}

If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed.
Effect: Hamstringing Strike.name: Effect: Hamstringing Strike

Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.o1gGG36wpn9mxeop]{Life}

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Minor Curse

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

Moderate Curse

The flow of life energy away from you can't be reversed.

In addition to the effects of your minor curse, you can't be healed by magical effects originating from other creatures. However, if you are unconscious, magical effects can restore you to 1 HP (but no higher). You are affected normally by healing elixirs, potions, and other items.

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} and all your targets are living creatures, you roll d12s instead of d8s for the amount of healing.

Whenever you finish casting a non-cantrip spell, you restore Hit Points equal to the spell level to your choice of either one target of the spell or the creature nearest to you. You can't heal yourself in this way. This healing has the healing, necromancy, and positive traits, as well as the tradition trait of the spell.

Major Curse (11th)

Life energy tears through you to empower your magic. Some of your spells carry positive energy with them.

Each time you use a spell slot to cast a 5th-level or higher spell that takes 2 or more actions to cast, you disperse positive energy in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] with the effects of a 3-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell with a level 4 lower than that of the spell you cast. This healing occurs immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. You don't benefit from this healing. Instead, you lose double the number of Hit Points rolled for the heal spell.
Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.name: Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life

Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Twin Parry.name: Effect: Twin Parry

Effect: Disrupting Strikes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nm8n3urzpDqXni1i]{Disrupting Strikes}

Your weapon and unarmed Strikes gain the effects of a disrupting property rune until the start of your next turn.

If you're 14th level or higher, your Strikes instead gain the effects of a greater disrupting property rune.
Effect: Disrupting Strikes.name: Effect: Disrupting Strikes

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Orchard's Endurance.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.
Effect: Orchard's Endurance.name: Effect: Orchard's Endurance

Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.name: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Bonus - Self)

Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.description: Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.
Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Draconic Blood Magic

Effect: Aura of Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{Aura of Life}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.
Effect: Aura of Life.name: Effect: Aura of Life

Stance: Arcane Cascade.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action to Cast a Spell or make a Spellstrike.

You divert a portion of the spell's magical power and keep it cycling through your body and weapon using specialized forms, breathing, or footwork. While you're in the stance, your melee Strikes deal [[/r {1}]]{1 extra damage}. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. Any Strike that benefits from this damage gains the arcane trait, making it magical.

If your most recent spell before entering the stance was one that can deal damage, the damage from the stance is the same type that spell could deal (or one type of your choice if the spell could deal multiple types of damage). If the spell couldn't deal damage, this stance's bonus damage depends on the spell's school.

  • Abjuration or Evocation force
  • Conjuration or Transmutation same type as your weapon or unarmed attack
  • Divination, Enchantment, or Illusion mental
  • Necromancy negative
Stance: Arcane Cascade.name: Stance: Arcane Cascade

Effect: Decry Thief (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -5 foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.
Effect: Decry Thief (Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Success)

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a necromancy spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 negative damage.
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative)

Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tzDW9l4lBwXCVYtz]{Ash}

Curse of Creeping Ashes

Your body is slowly being consumed by the fires of your internal power, purifying you with each passing day. You are occasionally wracked with dry, wheezing coughs, and wherever you go you leave behind a fine trace of ash that falls from your body.

Minor Curse

The smoldering furnace of power within you begins to feed on your body and generate ash, which you inhale with every breath and leave behind with every step, impeding your footing. You take a –1 penalty on Constitution-based checks, such as Fortitude saves, and your Speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Moderate Curse

The ash you produce intensifies and fills the area around you, obscuring details and making the ground challenging to navigate. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}. An aura of ash surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation. You and creatures in the aura are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}. If you do not move for 1 round, heaps of ashes settle in the aura, creating difficult terrain that lasts until you move (when the ashes blow away).

Major Curse (11th)

You and nearby creatures collapse into ash with the slightest flame. Within your moderate curse's aura, you and all creatures gain weakness to fire equal to half your level. If a creature other than you in this aura is killed by fire damage, its body collapses into ash. Objects and structures in your aura halve their Hardness, and any parts of the object or structures in your aura that are reduced to 0 Hit Points collapse into ash.
Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.name: Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast an abjuration spell or an evocation spell that didn't deal damage.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 force damage.
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force)

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 fire damage, or an extra 1d6 fire damage if you have a domain spell with the fire trait.
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)

Stance: Everstand Stance.description: When in this stance, you wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction.
Stance: Everstand Stance.name: Stance: Everstand Stance

Effect: Fortify Shield.description: Add your level to your shield's Hardness.
Effect: Fortify Shield.name: Effect: Fortify Shield

Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.
Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful)

Effect: Anadi Venom.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.8aIe57gXJ94mPpW4]{Anadi Venom}

If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1d6 poison damage. On a critical failure, the poison is wasted as normal. At 12th level, this poison damage increases to 2d6.
Effect: Anadi Venom.name: Effect: Anadi Venom

Effect: Bon Mot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

You are distracted and takes a -2 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.
Effect: Bon Mot.name: Effect: Bon Mot

Stance: Fane's Fourberie.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.80CEAB05TP5ki9iW]{Fane's Fourberie}

Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

When you enter this stance, choose whether to treat playing cards in your possession as daggers or darts; you can wield a playing card in all ways as the chosen weapon until the stance ends. As long as the majority of the deck remains in your possession, any cards that are lost or thrown can be found after 1 minute. Otherwise, the remaining cards are likely lost or destroyed.

A character who has this feat can enchant a single deck of playing cards as a magic weapon, etching fundamental and property runes directly onto the deck of cards.
Stance: Fane's Fourberie.name: Stance: Fane's Fourberie

Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0]{Cut From The Air}.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
Effect: Cut from the Air.name: Effect: Cut from the Air

Stance: Mountain Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance}

You enter the stance of an implacable mountain—a technique first discovered by dwarven monks—allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche. The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Mountain Stance, you gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +0, meaning you don't add your Dexterity to your AC, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, mage armor, and bracers of armor.
Stance: Mountain Stance.name: Stance: Mountain Stance

Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.description:
You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points like your rival Shino Hakusa. You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals @Damage[1d4[negative]] damage, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile positive traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes -10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.
Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.name: Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance

Effect: Celestial Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vtCrMziYxNyj8kP7]{Celestial Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed while you've manifested your wings.
Effect: Celestial Wings.name: Effect: Celestial Wings

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and already have a swimSpeed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your swim Speed.
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed)

Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GTSvbFb36InvuH0w]{Flames}

Curse of Engulfing Flames

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

Minor Curse

The smoke, heat, and crackling flames of your curse fill your vision and all your other senses.

Creatures further than 30 feet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you. You can't benefit from effects that would allow you to ignore or mitigate this concealment, as normal for effects of an oracular curse.

Moderate Curse

Smoke and flickering visions of flame fill your senses more completely, and harmless flickers of obscuring flames also fill your space.

You are concealed from other creatures, though as the other creatures aren't cursed themselves, they can benefit from effects that would allow them to ignore or mitigate the concealed condition, as normal. All other creatures and objects are concealed from you regardless of distance; however, when casting a fire spell, you automatically succeed at the flat check for this concealed condition for targets within 30 feet.

All your senses become imprecise beyond 30 feet, meaning everything past 30 feet that you'd normally be able to see is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you.

Major Curse (11th)

The flames surrounding you are no longer simply visions.

An aura of fire surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation, dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage (basic Reflex save) to all other creatures in the aura at the end of each of your turns. You lose [[/r 1d6]] Hit Points at the end of your turn each round, with no save; if you have a weakness to fire, increase the number of HP you lose by that weakness.

You can suppress your aura until the start of your next turn by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to diminish the flames, causing neither you nor anyone in the aura to take damage. While Refocusing to reduce your curse, you are continually diminishing the flames, so you don't lose HP. The flames subside if you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, but they resume when you wake up unless you rested for long enough to reset your curse. As usual for oracular curses, you can't mitigate or reduce the lost Hit Points in any way, though you can still heal the lost HP normally after the fact.
Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.name: Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames

Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.description:
As a candle can light another, you awaken the latent potential to channel fire in other creatures. You shed faint, glowing embers, as do your allies while they're in your kinetic aura. Anyone shedding these embers gains a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks and can Step as a free action once per round. When an affected creature takes a move action, its Strikes deal an extra @Damage[2[fire]] damage until the end of its turn.

Level (12th) The status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks is +2, and the Strikes gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} rune instead of the extra 2 fire damage.
Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Stance: Kindle Inner Flames

Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY]{Tempest}

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

Minor Curse

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

Moderate Curse

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] and carries rain on the winds. The whirling winds impose a -2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target you or originate from you.

Your weakness to electricity increases to 5 or half your level, whichever is greater, but torrential rain grants you an equal amount of fire resistance.

Major Curse (11th)

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] and grows stronger. High winds blowing outward in the aura impede creatures' progress. The aura is difficult terrain for Large and smaller creatures on the ground, and for Huge or smaller flying creatures. You aren't affected by this difficult terrain.

The electricity arcing through you becomes dangerous. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[1d6[electricity]] damage. As normal, this doesn't affect creatures you touch.
Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.name: Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm

Effect: Guided Skill.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to checks made using Acrobatics, Occultism, Stealth, or Survival.
Effect: Guided Skill.name: Effect: Guided Skill

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success)

Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).
Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.name: Stance: Rain of Embers Stance

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and already have a climb Speed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your climb Speed.
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed)

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit

Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.
Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Effect: Mutate Weapon

Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.
Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]{Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)

Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description: You have a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you Strike an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.
Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance

Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IaiEZaA8erufMUCr]{Whirling Blade Stance}

You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

All melee Monk weapons you wield with the finesse trait gain the thrown 10 feet trait (unless they already have the thrown trait with a greater range).

Once you've made a thrown Strike with such a weapon, you can use the precision of your throw to make additional Strikes with it, even from a distance. Start from the space of the previous Strike's target to determine the range increment and whether the new target has cover. At the end of your turn, the thrown weapon flies directly back to you in a straight line. If a solid barrier blocks its path, it falls to the ground after hitting the barrier.
Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.name: Stance: Whirling Blade Stance

Effect: Blizzard Evasion.description: You gain resistance 10 to physical damage and weakness 10 to force damage. You gain a fly speed of 40 feet.
Effect: Blizzard Evasion.name: Effect: Blizzard Evasion

Effect: Renewed Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.
Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Effect: Renewed Vigor

Effect: Root Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.22P7IFyhrF7Fbw8B]{Root Magic}

The first time that day the ally attempts a saving throw against a spell or haunt, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the roll. This bonus increases to +2 if you're an expert in Occultism or +3 if you're legendary.
Effect: Root Magic.name: Effect: Root Magic

Effect: Avenge in Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gKDRnsBPBdhJB0FI]{Avenge in Glory}

Frequency once per day

Access mountain dwarf ethnicity

Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You honor your ally's life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoints based on level
  • Sets a circumstance bonus of +1 to attack and damage rolls
Effect: Avenge in Glory.name: Effect: Avenge in Glory

Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.description: The target can't flank or contribute to allies' flanking.
Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.name: Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flanking)

Effect: Augment Senses.description: Until the start of your next turn, you can't be flanked.
Effect: Augment Senses.name: Effect: Augment Senses

Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{Defensive Recovery}

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.
Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: Effect: Defensive Recovery

Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.
Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description: You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Effect: Inspired Stratagem

Effect: Divine Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xoIxiRtBVHV27Rvd]{Divine Aegis}

Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.
Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Effect: Divine Aegis

Effect: Wings of Air.description: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.
Effect: Wings of Air.name: Effect: Wings of Air

Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and resistance depending on your harrow omen.
Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck.name: Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck

Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -10 foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.
Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success)

Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}

You gain a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon the originator of the aura is wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Dread Marshal Stance

Effect: Educate Allies (Self).description: Granted by using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies} on your allies.
Effect: Educate Allies (Self).name: Effect: Educate Allies (Self)

Stance: Powder Punch Stance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ziky4XVV7syXVbUg]{Powder Punch Stance}

You infuse your handwraps with black powder. On your first melee Strike each round with an unarmed attack, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.dgXjUcaoQDAY6ZpO]{Knuckle Duster}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8eGV6fXbmt2v74uB]{Black Powder Knuckle Dusters}, you deal an additional 1 fire Damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.
Stance: Powder Punch Stance.name: Stance: Powder Punch Stance

Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.
Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).name: Effect: Align Armament (Lawful)

Effect: Precious Arrow.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MlxfNv98LZKfYl64]{Precious Arrow}

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.
Effect: Precious Arrow.name: Effect: Precious Arrow

Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.GpT5RXUwhINODqkJ]{(Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walking the Cardinal Paths}

One of your weapons or your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2d6 fire, cold, acid, or electricity damage. The Strikes gain the appropriate energy trait as well.
Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.name: Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target)

Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description: Your aura grants you and your allies a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you or an ally in the aura Strike an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.
Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Granted By:@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Effect: Protective Spirit Mask

Effect: Aura of Righteousness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.erCOcFZJPT2O3gwC]{Aura of Righteousness}

You and all allies within 15 feet gain evil resistance 5.
Effect: Aura of Righteousness.name: Effect: Aura of Righteousness

Effect: Cat Nap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.
Effect: Cat Nap.name: Effect: Cat Nap

Stance: Multishot Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{Multishot Stance}.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for Double Shot is reduced to -1, or -2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.
Stance: Multishot Stance.name: Stance: Multishot Stance

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
