Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and any monk weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack. Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved (using the number of damage dice of your unarmed attack to determine the damage dealt).

If you also know the ki blast ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead).
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Effect: Heaven's Thunder

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)

Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YZ138OqflDhrkqmR]{Enforce Oath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a -1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or if the chosen creature goes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.
Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Effect: Enforce Oath

Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.
Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Effect: Sea Glass Guardians

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Outwit} edge with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit

Effect: Formation Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aoz9dCq2NynyUYEf]{Formation Training}

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.
Effect: Formation Training.name: Effect: Formation Training

Stance: Disarming Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{Disarming Stance}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you.
Stance: Disarming Stance.name: Stance: Disarming Stance

Effect: Strained Metabolism.description:
Your body's overclocked physiology requires larger-than-usual amounts of nourishment, leaving you weakened when it kicks in mid-combat.

Mild Backlash Your metabolism immediately burns through your body's energy stores, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until you take a bite of food (which usually requires 2 Interact actions: one to retrieve the food and another to consume it).

Moderate Backlash Ravenous hunger wracks your body. You are enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until you can eat a full meal, which requires at least 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash The strain on your body is truly incapacitating. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} as nausea wracks you, and you are also enfeebled 1 and clumsy 1 until you can eat a full meal (which requires you to no longer be sickened). You are fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.
Effect: Strained Metabolism.name: Effect: Strained Metabolism

Stance: Graceful Poise.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rFaUJtB46scuAidY]{Graceful Poise}

With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion's stinger.

While you are in this stance, if you make your second Strike from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice} with an agile weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.
Stance: Graceful Poise.name: Stance: Graceful Poise

Effect: Control Tower.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.
Effect: Control Tower.name: Effect: Control Tower

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Effect: Ghosts in the Storm

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precision} edge with you.

You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision

Effect: Aura of Despair.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wjnfdh6WzN7HbmeE]{Aura Of Despair}

Enemies within 15 of you take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear.
Effect: Aura of Despair.name: Effect: Aura of Despair

Effect: Aura Junction (Air).description: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to land and fly Speed.
Effect: Aura Junction (Air).name: Effect: Aura Junction (Air)

Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.
Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: Effect: Fiendish Wings

Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).description: The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.
Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure)

Stance: Tenacious Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5HZ4cYDowUw2oUbZ]{Tenacious Stance}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) and a +2 circumstance bonus to DCs against being Shoved and Tripped.
Stance: Tenacious Stance.name: Stance: Tenacious Stance

Effect: Harrow the Fiend.description: You gain a +1 status bonus on all Strikes or spell attack rolls against fiends.
Effect: Harrow the Fiend.name: Effect: Harrow the Fiend

Effect: Overdrive (Success).description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.
Effect: Overdrive (Success).name: Effect: Overdrive (Success)

Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).description: Hellfire fills your tongue with lies. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.
Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self)

Effect: Giant's Lunge.description: Until your rage ends, all your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain reach 10.
Effect: Giant's Lunge.name: Effect: Giant's Lunge

Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.
Effect: Monster Warden.name: Effect: Monster Warden

Effect: Engine of Destruction.description: Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.
Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Effect: Engine of Destruction

Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability.

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.
Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Effect: Resounding Bravery

Effect: Harden Flesh.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.REgTwIVgI3j1FQiJ]{Harden Flesh}

You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Harden Flesh.name: Effect: Harden Flesh

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Perception).description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, imposing a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Perception).name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Perception)

Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.
Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs

Stance: Crane Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}

You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane's wings and using flowing, defensive motions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, but the only Strikes you can make are crane wing attacks. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Crane Stance, reduce the DC for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} by 5, and when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.
Stance: Crane Stance.name: Stance: Crane Stance

Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rByA8NDI6ZtNgBeT]{Mobile Shot Stance}

Your shots become nimble and deadly. While you're in this stance, your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Attack of Opportunity}, you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.
Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.name: Stance: Mobile Shot Stance

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical Success)

Effect: Elementalist Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{Elementalist Dedication}

Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice: air, earth, fire, or water. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait. This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.
Effect: Elementalist Dedication.name: Effect: Elementalist Dedication

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead.
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Effect: Push Back the Dead!

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and do not already have a swim Speed.

You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed.
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed)

Effect: Shed Tail.description: You take a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.
Effect: Shed Tail.name: Effect: Shed Tail

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)

Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth for 1 round.
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth)

Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.EslxR2sbDK9XJaAl]{Time}

Curse of Turbulent Moments

Time passes differently for you than everyone else. You experience fluxes that might manifest as minor day-to-day changes in your apparent age, such as a gray lock of hair or a disappearing wrinkle, or as occasional ghostly temporal afterimages that slightly trail your movement.

Minor Curse

As you draw upon your mystery, time's passage becomes more disjointed, aging, regressing, or warping you out of sync. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}. In addition, you take a -2 penalty to saving throws against effects that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}.

Moderate Curse

Time distorts further, increasing your muscular atrophy, age regression, or warping while making effects pass you by at an increased rate. The value of your enfeebled condition increases to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -3. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +2. In addition, spells affecting you last less time; their duration is reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. This doesn't reduce the spell's duration for other targets affected by the same spell. Finally, all non-permanent conditions affecting you that have a duration measured in rounds, minutes, or hours have their duration reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. Any afflictions (such as poisons, diseases, and curses) affecting you have their maximum duration, onset time, and time for each stage reduced by half. Spells, conditions, and afflictions that last "until your next daily preparations" last for 12 hours or until your next daily preparations, whichever comes first. This doesn't change the duration you're temporarily immune, the rate at which you can use abilities that have a frequency, or any other features based on the passage of time.

Major Curse (11th)

You become so out of sync with time that it's hard for you to act, but when you do act, you do so with incredible speed. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, the value of your enfeebled condition increases to 3, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -4. Time passes so much faster for you that your steps appear as a blur of motion to others. You gain a +4 status bonus to initiative rolls. Whenever you move, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while you're moving and until the start of your next turn. As normal for concealment where your location is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +4.
Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.name: Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 electricity damage, or an extra 1d6 electricity damage if you have a domain spell with the electricity trait.
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)

Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.
Effect: Discordant Voice.name: Effect: Discordant Voice

Effect: Gathering Moss.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yg02rHaDPpGSgkrk]{Gathering Moss}

You gain fast healing equal to your level.
Effect: Gathering Moss.name: Effect: Gathering Moss

Effect: Calculate Threats.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Fha8jFmfkOPxAsrZ]{Calculate Threats}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves until the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Calculate Threats.name: Effect: Calculate Threats

Stance: Six Pillars Stance.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hT0pVPqFuiEsmRb8]{Six Pillars Stance}

Requirements You are unarmored.

You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed. While in this stance, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.
Stance: Six Pillars Stance.name: Stance: Six Pillars Stance

Stance: Tiger Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VCjAlOvjNvFJOsG5]{Tiger Stance}

You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

On a critical success with your tiger claws, if you deal damage, the target takes @Damage[1d4[bleed]].

As long as your Speed is at least 20 feet while in Tiger Stance, you can Step 10 feet.
Stance: Tiger Stance.name: Stance: Tiger Stance

Stance: Jellyfish Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Jwq5o13uZF3ooln1]{Jellyfish Stance}

Requirements You are unarmored.

You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity. You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1d6 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in Jellyfish Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}.
Stance: Jellyfish Stance.name: Stance: Jellyfish Stance

Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2tUdsoPEnW9yS8so]{Tangled Forest Stance}

You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes' movements. You can make lashing branch unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you're in Tangled Forest Stance and can act, every enemy in your reach that tries to move away from you must succeed at a Reflex save, Acrobatics check, or Athletics check against your class DC or be immobilized for that action. If you prefer, you can allow the enemy to move.
Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.name: Stance: Tangled Forest Stance

Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]{Battle}

Curse of the Hero's Burden

You thrive while adrenaline flows and your life depends on your might alone, but holding the collective battle prowess of the ages within you leaves your body weakened after a fight. You smell faintly of steel and blood no matter how you try to remove or mask the scent, you appear more muscular than you actually are, and you hear the faint clash and clamor of battle in the distance at all times.

Minor Curse

Your body languishes when you aren't bringing harm to your foes. You take a -2 status penalty to AC and saving throws, but each time you make a Strike, you can suspend these penalties until the start of your next turn.

Moderate Curse

The strain of conflict wears upon your body, even though you gain vitality from it. Making a Strike reduces the penalty from your minor curse to -1 rather than suspending it entirely. You gain a +2 status bonus to weapon and unarmed damage rolls. You also gain fast healing equal to half your level while in a non-trivial combat encounter.

Major Curse (11th)

Your body proves capable of truly heroic feats, but doing so interferes with your mental focus. Your moderate curse's fast healing is equal to your level, and its damage bonus is +6. You gain a +1 status bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, but you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.
Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.name: Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden

Effect: Fleet Tempo.description: You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.
Effect: Fleet Tempo.name: Effect: Fleet Tempo

Stance: Buckler Dance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tDWc2LQNl0Op1Auq]{Buckler Dance}

Requirements You are wielding a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{Buckler}.

You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack. While you are in this stance, you constantly have your buckler raised as if you'd used @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}, as long as you meet that action's requirements.
Stance: Buckler Dance.name: Stance: Buckler Dance

Effect: Defensive Instincts.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]{Defensive Instincts}

Requirements you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.
Effect: Defensive Instincts.name: Effect: Defensive Instincts

Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Effect: Reflexive Shield

Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike} if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzfWrOqHL2GcK0rr]{Enduring Debilitation}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.
Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike

Effect: Tail Toxin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ev8OHpBO3xq3Zt08]{Tail Toxin}

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next Strike with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal persistent poison damage equal to your level to the target.
Effect: Tail Toxin.name: Effect: Tail Toxin

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Hydration.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.vt67b8uoNEbskcBv]{Hydration} if you spend 24 hours outside of water.
Effect: Hydration.name: Effect: Hydration

Stance: Whirlwind Stance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wZZyasfIqwiJBQAQ]{Whirlwind Stance}

Requirements You are wielding your staff, which must have the parry trait.

You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as you remain in this stance.
Stance: Whirlwind Stance.name: Stance: Whirlwind Stance

Stance: Disruptive Stance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OEGhbRgW6wRbccns]{Disruptive Stance}

The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you're prepared to foil enemies' actions.

As long as you are in this stance, you can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Attack of Opportunity} when a creature within your reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to manipulate and move actions.

Furthermore, you disrupt a triggering concentrate or manipulate action if your Strike hits (not only if it's a critical hit).
Stance: Disruptive Stance.name: Stance: Disruptive Stance

Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.
Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.name: Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance

Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape}.

In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.
Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).name: Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin)

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: Effect: Inspiring Resilience

Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.description: You gain darkvision and low-light vision, and you gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks.
Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.name: Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs

Stance: Dragon Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8sy3sHwOHS4ImwvJ]{Dragon Stance}

You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon's tail. You can make dragon tail attacks that deal 1d10 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the backswing, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Dragon Stance, you can ignore the first square of difficult terrain while Striding.
Stance: Dragon Stance.name: Stance: Dragon Stance

Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon the you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Stance: Dread Marshal Stance

Effect: Bone Swarm.description:
You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.
Effect: Bone Swarm.name: Effect: Bone Swarm

Effect: Anchored.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zxlbMEaXglMVsLpQ]{Tunnel Wall}

You become Anchored and gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} your space.
Effect: Anchored.name: Effect: Anchored

Effect: Guided by the Stars.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]{Guided by the Stars}

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.
Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: Effect: Guided by the Stars

Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]{Harsh Judgement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.
Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement

Effect: Daydream Trance.description: You take a -1 penalty to Perception checks and initiative rolls and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects. If you're legendary in Occultism, the bonus against mental effects increases to +3.
Effect: Daydream Trance.name: Effect: Daydream Trance

Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.description: You gain temporary hit points equal to your level.
Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.name: Effect: Wood Impulse Junction

Effect: Vicious Debilitations.description: The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.
Effect: Vicious Debilitations.name: Effect: Vicious Debilitations

Effect: Fey Blood Magic.description: Colorful fey glamours dance around you or one target, causing them to be concealed for 1 round. Such obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.
Effect: Fey Blood Magic.name: Effect: Fey Blood Magic

Effect: Share Rage.description:
You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.
Effect: Share Rage.name: Effect: Share Rage

Stance: Gorilla Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance}

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.
Stance: Gorilla Stance.name: Stance: Gorilla Stance

Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.description:
Requirements You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements. You can make flashing spark attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. They are in the brawling group and have the forceful, nonlethal, sweep, and unarmed traits. If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes 1d6 persistent fire damage.

While in Stoked Flame Stance, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. If you have incredible movement, increase the benefit from incredible movement to a +15-foot status bonus plus 5 feet for every 4 levels beyond 3rd.

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.
Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.name: Stance: Stoked Flame Stance

Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.
Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Effect: Marshal's Aura

Effect: Propulsive Leap.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.
Effect: Propulsive Leap.name: Effect: Propulsive Leap

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).name: Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness)

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, imposing a -1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 round.
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)

Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RI2EMRBBPNSoTJXu]{Cosmos}

Curse of the Sky's Call

You have your head in the clouds-and not just figuratively. Your body is drawn toward the heavens, making you lighter and less substantial than you should be. Your eyes glow with starry light, and your hair and clothing float and drift around you.

Minor Curse

Your unnatural lightness makes it hard to keep your footing and interact with other physical objects. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and take a -2 penalty to saves and DCs against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and other forms of forced movement.

Moderate Curse

Your body is drawn further skyward. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -3.

You are treated as one size smaller for wind effects. You gain a +2 status bonus against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} attempts, you only take half as much damage from falls, and you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HJYQlmGTdtyGWr6a]{Powerful Leap} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Quick Jump} skill feats. You weigh only half as much, and your Bulk, should someone need to carry you, is also half as much.

Major Curse (11th)

As your body rises, you float just above the ground beneath you. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -4.

You can walk on liquids as if they were solid; you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TVFfTP9fHRidwBlW]{Cloud Jump} skill feat; and you don't leave tracks, trigger weight-sensitive pressure plates, or otherwise connect with the ground below you.
Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.name: Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call

Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6cQSPqXoAO6oJl0i]{Shooting Stars Stance}

You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.
Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.name: Stance: Shooting Stars Stance

Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.
Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Effect: Scout's Warning

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{Emblazon Antimagic}.

When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract level. If they attempt to do so, the emblazoned symbol immediately disappears.
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon)

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Success)

Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.description: An angelic aura protects you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.
Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Angelic Blood Magic

Effect: Shield Ally.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.
Effect: Shield Ally.name: Effect: Shield Ally

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Activation).description: The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and its Strikes gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock} rune.
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Activation).name: Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Activation)

Effect: Blade Ally.description:
A spirit of battle dwells within your armaments. Select one weapon or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Handwraps of Mighty Blows} when you make your daily preparations. In your hands, the item gains the effect of a property rune.

From @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.EtltLdiy9kNfHU0c]{Blade Ally}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Disrupting}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.P6v2AtJw7AUwaDzf]{Fearsome}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.roeYtwlIe65BPMJ1]{Shifting}

From @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.h5ksUZlrVGBjq6p4]{Radiant Blade Spirit}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.65YL6nk1jIzCWutt]{Anarchic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6xu6dPIaUZ7edKEB]{Axiomatic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Unholy}

From @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jYEMVfrXJLpXS6aC]{Radiant Blade Master}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{Dancing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oVrVzML63VFvVfKk]{Disrupting (Greater)}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{Keen}
Effect: Blade Ally.name: Effect: Blade Ally

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and do not already have a climb Speed.

You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed)

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EWeso1zDkCLGlnsW]{Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a -2 penalty to AC, and a -1 penalty to saves. These bonuses and penalties last until your Rage ends or until you are above half Hit Points, whichever comes first.
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)

Effect: Ghost Wrangler.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.00OnDt8UEMwfoYWH]{Ghost Wrangler}

Your fists gain the effects of the ghost touch property rune.
Effect: Ghost Wrangler.name: Effect: Ghost Wrangler

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)

Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.description: Clouds, like eager pets, are drawn to you and to those in your good graces. Fast-moving gray clouds surround you, as well as your allies while they're in your kinetic aura. Anyone surrounded by these clouds gains a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks. When an affected creature uses a move action, clouds dance around it. Until the start of its next turn, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and its Strikes gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock} rune.
Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Stance: Ghosts in the Storm

Effect: Aura Junction (Wood).description: Any ally that begins its turn in the aura gains 1 temporary Hit Point that lasts until the start of its next turn. This increases to 2 temporary Hit Points if you're 10th level or higher and to 3 temporary Hit Points if you're 15th level or higher.
Effect: Aura Junction (Wood).name: Effect: Aura Junction (Wood)

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round.
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self)

Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.
Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Effect: Shared Avoidance

Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.
Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Poison Weapon

Effect: Current Spell (Air).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the air trait.

This effect has the air trait.
Effect: Current Spell (Air).name: Effect: Current Spell (Air)

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]{Esoteric Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)

Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tZBb3Kh4nJcNoUFI]{Lore}

Curse of Torrential Knowledge

You have a link to true divine knowledge, but your mortal mind struggles to process and act on what you know. Loose materials around you, such as dust, grains of rice, and droplets of water, slowly shift to form strange runes or faint indecipherable writing, and you sometimes speak unintelligible truths or statements in unknown languages without realizing it.

Minor Curse

You take a -4 penalty to initiative, as trying to process a surge of information about what's happening around you slows your ability to respond to it.

Moderate Curse

The flow of information through your mind grows. The attention you divert to process this huge influx of information means you are always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}.

At the start of each of your turns, you automatically make one check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} as a free action. This uses a skill of your choice that has the Recall Knowledge action, using a result equal to 10 + your proficiency bonus in that skill (with no other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

Major Curse (11th)

The massive flow of information clouding your mind overwhelms your ability to communicate with others. You can understand all languages, but you can't speak, use linguistic effects, or otherwise communicate with your allies.

If you Cast a Spell with a verbal component, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or the spell is lost.

You gain a +4 status bonus on saving throws against linguistic effects.
Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.name: Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge

Effect: Invigorating Breath.description: You gain 20 temporary Hit Points. At 15th level, you instead gain 30 temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Invigorating Breath.name: Effect: Invigorating Breath

Effect: Safeguard Soul.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.
Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Effect: Safeguard Soul

Stance: Ironblood Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.x9cYkB8DrUBBwqJd]{Ironblood Stance}

You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow. You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, parry, sweep, and unarmed traits.

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12th level, to 4 at 16th level, and to 5 at 20th level.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.fRlvmul3LbLo2xvR]{Effect: Parry}
Stance: Ironblood Stance.name: Stance: Ironblood Stance

Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.description: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.
Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.name: Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Boost

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon)

Effect: Holy Castigation.description:
Imposed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.142QRyK2aPIrJu48]{Holy Castigation}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spells you cast damage fiends as though they were undead.
Effect: Holy Castigation.name: Effect: Holy Castigation

Effect: Clue In (Expertise).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.
Effect: Clue In (Expertise).name: Effect: Clue In (Expertise)

Effect: Tidal Shield.description: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. You can Sustain the effect to a maximum duration of 5 rounds.
Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Effect: Tidal Shield

Effect: Panache.description:
You care as much about the way you accomplish something as whether you actually accomplish it in the first place. When you perform an action with particular bravado, you can leverage this moment of verve to perform spectacular, deadly maneuvers. This state of flair is called panache, and you are either in a state of panache or you are not.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}
Effect: Panache.name: Effect: Panache

Effect: Fulminating Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.o3J79hnr00ztcwtT]{Fulminating Shot}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit with your next attack roll using a firearm or crossbow before the end of your turn, you deal 1d6 additional damage of this type. At 12th level, this increases to 2d6 additional damage, and at 18th level, it increases to 3d6 additional damage.
Effect: Fulminating Shot.name: Effect: Fulminating Shot

Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1d4 negative damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and to the DC for creatures to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.
Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.name: Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance

Effect: Witch's Charge.description: Granted when you designate someone as your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{Witch's Charge}.
Effect: Witch's Charge.name: Effect: Witch's Charge

Stance: Ricochet Stance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tRHjUCl0xqG97nok]{Ricochet Stance (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RsNvCSrCN7czHC0G]{Ricochet Stance (Rogue)}

You adopt a stance designed to rebound your thrown weapons back toward you. While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged Strike to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon's listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.
Stance: Ricochet Stance.name: Stance: Ricochet Stance

Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.description: Aberrant whispers shield one target's mind or your own, granting a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws for 1 round.
Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.name: Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic

Effect: Offensive Boost.description:
If your innovation is armor, the boost applies to your melee Strikes with one weapon you choose during daily preparations; if your innovation is a construct, the boost applies to your construct companion's Strikes; Choose one of the following boosts, with the damage type in parentheses.

  • Chill (Cold) Your innovation rapidly absorbs heat, creating an intense chill.
  • Ignition (Fire) Your innovation shoots out jets of searing flame.
  • Jolt (Electricity) Your innovation jolts foes with charges of electricity.
  • Momentum (Bludgeoning) Your innovation slams into foes with added momentum.
  • Saws (Slashing) Your innovation reveals spinning sawblades during your attacks.
  • Spike (Piercing) Your innovation reveals wicked spikes during your attacks.
  • Vitriol (Acid) Your innovation releases spurts of caustic acid.
Effect: Offensive Boost.name: Effect: Offensive Boost

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Flurry} edge with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry

Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Spin Tale.name: Effect: Spin Tale

Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{Gorilla Pound}, which grants you a climb speed of 15 while you are in this stance.

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.
Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).name: Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)

Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.qvRlih3u7vK3FYUR]{Ancestors}

Curse of Ancestral Meddling

The ancestral spirits you commune with haunt you and meddle with your belongings and actions, either out of a well-intentioned (but ultimately detrimental) attempt to assist you, as punishment for your audacity in circumventing the traditional means of achieving divine power, for their own amusement, or a mixture of the above. Your hair, clothing, and belongings constantly shift and stir, seemingly of their own volition.

Minor Curse

One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. This predominant ancestor guides you to use their preferred type of action. When you try to use one of the types of actions listed for the other ancestors, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:4]. On a failure, you spend the action but gain no effect (though you don't lose the spell if you were Casting a Spell). If your action would take 1 minute or longer, it's long enough that you can overcome the meddling, and you don't need to attempt a flat check.

During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Moderate Curse

The flat check DC to use other actions is 6, and you get the moderate curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor in the list below.

Major Curse (11th)

The flat check DC is 8, and you get the major curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor instead of the moderate curse benefit.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's level.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's level + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions
Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.name: Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling

Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.description: A surge of ancestral memories grants you or one target a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.
Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.name: Effect: Imperial Blood Magic

Effect: Clue In.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In}

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.
Effect: Clue In.name: Effect: Clue In

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a critical failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -4 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical Failure)

Stance: Peafowl Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}

You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.
Stance: Peafowl Stance.name: Stance: Peafowl Stance

Effect: Ancestral Influence.description:
One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's level.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's level + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions
Effect: Ancestral Influence.name: Effect: Ancestral Influence

Effect: Aura of Faith.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7sFhBYoz5GSBFNbY]{Aura of Faith}

Each good-aligned ally within 15 feet deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.
Effect: Aura of Faith.name: Effect: Aura of Faith

Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).description: The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.
Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure)

Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.
Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Monster Hunter

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Effect: Guardian's Deflection

Stance: Lunging Stance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZghzLmYgeE19GqjP]{Lunging Stance}

Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon

Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies. While you are in this stance, you can use Attack of Opportunity against a creature that is outside your reach but within the reach you would have with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rTkr1EqpAN6YtnAh]{Lunge}. If you do, you increase your range with the Strike by 5 feet.
Stance: Lunging Stance.name: Stance: Lunging Stance

Effect: Topple Giants.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.
Effect: Topple Giants.name: Effect: Topple Giants

Effect: Rallying Charge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.df4cBV3qZn3qNUmP]{Rallying Charge}

You gain temporary hit points equal to the Charisma modifier of the creature that used Rallying Charge.
Effect: Rallying Charge.name: Effect: Rallying Charge

Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).description: The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.
Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Success)

Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bqZkAFS6eq9TKXMO]{Dragon's Rage Wings}

While you are raging, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.name: Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings

Effect: Seedpod.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWGa6cFSVrASTEfd]{Seedpod}

On a critical hit, a seedpod bursts, issuing forth a tangle of vegetation that imposes a -10-foot circumstance penalty on the target's Speed for 1 round.
Effect: Seedpod.name: Effect: Seedpod

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[cold]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)

Effect: Guardian's Embrace.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against physical attacks and can use a reaction to gain resistance 10 to physical damage dealt by that attack, which ends this effect.
Effect: Guardian's Embrace.name: Effect: Guardian's Embrace

Effect: Favorable Winds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX]{Favorable Winds}.

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.
Effect: Favorable Winds.name: Effect: Favorable Winds

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 acid damage, or an extra 1d6 acid damage if you have a domain spell with the acid trait.
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)

Effect: Elemental Assault.description: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d6]] damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.
Effect: Elemental Assault.name: Effect: Elemental Assault

Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.
Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).name: Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic)

Effect: Cavalier's Banner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
Effect: Cavalier's Banner.name: Effect: Cavalier's Banner

Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{Enlightened Presence}.

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.
Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Effect: Enlightened Presence

Effect: Brightness Seeker.description:
Trigger You attempt an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw while performing the course of action from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, but you haven't rolled yet.

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was woe and you proceeded anyway.
Effect: Brightness Seeker.name: Effect: Brightness Seeker

Effect: Devise a Stratagem.description:
You assess a foe's weaknesses in combat and use them to formulate a plan of attack against your enemy. Choose a creature you can see, and roll a d20. If you Strike the chosen creature later this round, you must use the result of the roll you made to Devise a Stratagem for your Strike's attack roll instead of rolling. You make this substitution only for the first Strike you make against the creature this round, not any subsequent attacks.

When you make this substitution, you can also add your Intelligence modifier to your attack roll instead of your Strength or Dexterity modifier, provided your Strike uses an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, a ranged weapon (which must be agile or finesse if it's a melee weapon with the thrown trait) or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TLQErnOpM9Luy7rL]{Sap}.

If you're aware that the creature you choose is the subject of a lead you're pursuing, you can use this ability as a free action.
Effect: Devise a Stratagem.name: Effect: Devise a Stratagem

Effect: Starlight Armor.description:
The armor grants you resistance 7 to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage. The armor also sheds bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

When you reach 17th level, the resistance increases to 10.
Effect: Starlight Armor.name: Effect: Starlight Armor

Effect: Creeping Ashes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.G4L49aMxHqO2yqxi]{Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes}

Moderate Curse

You and creatures in the aura are concealed.

Major Curse

You and all creatures gain weakness to fire equal to half your level.
Effect: Creeping Ashes.name: Effect: Creeping Ashes

Effect: Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.
Effect: Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Debilitating Strike

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).description: The corruption of sin weakens a target's defenses. A target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round.
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target)

Effect: Metallic Skin.description: You fortify your natural resistances with elemental metal, covering your skin with thick metal. You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and resistance 10 to physical damage (except adamantine), but you take a –10-foot penalty to Speed. If you take fire damage while this ability is active, until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage with all your unarmed melee Strikes.
Effect: Metallic Skin.name: Effect: Metallic Skin

Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.O0POcPD2aELYTcIK]{Rough Terrain Stance}

Requirements You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn.

You enter a stance that makes it difficult to move around you. Each square adjacent to you becomes difficult terrain that matches the terrain attunement you gained (rime forms in an arctic terrain, momentary undergrowth shoots up in a forest terrain, and so on). You ignore this difficult terrain.

This stance ends if you move into a different type of terrain.
Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.name: Stance: Rough Terrain Stance

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Effect: Life-Giving Magic

Effect: Living for the Applause.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Living for the Applause.name: Effect: Living for the Applause

Stance: Orchard's Endurance.description:
Patches of bark appear on the skin of you and your nearby allies. You and your allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you and your affected allies roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Level (+4) The resistance increases by 2.
Stance: Orchard's Endurance.name: Stance: Orchard's Endurance

Effect: Soaring Flight.description: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below. You grow a pair of magical wings or expand your existing ones. For 5 minutes, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.
Effect: Soaring Flight.name: Effect: Soaring Flight

Effect: Rage.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoint based on level and con mod
  • Enables rage property for rage damage
  • Sets token effect
Effect: Rage.name: Effect: Rage

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.name: Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness, Expertise)

Effect: Assisting Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their roll.
Effect: Assisting Shot.name: Effect: Assisting Shot

Effect: Weapon Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gvx8Mdg5mxUtTD5g]{Weapon Infusion}.

If your next action is an Elemental Blast, choose a weapon shape for it to take. You can choose to change the blast's damage type to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing-whichever suits the weapon shape-and you can choose other alterations depending on whether you make a melee or ranged blast.

  • Melee Add one of the following traits of your choice: agile, backswing, forceful, reach, sweep.
  • Ranged Choose one of three options: range increment 100 feet and the volley 30 feet trait, range increment 50 feet and the propulsive trait, or range increment 20 feet and the thrown trait.
Effect: Weapon Infusion.name: Effect: Weapon Infusion

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]{Shining Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)

Effect: Energy Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TSDbyYRQwhIyY2Oq]{Energy Shot}

On your first three Strikes of this encounter with a firearm or crossbow, you deal an additional 1 acid, cold, fire or electricity damage. You choose which damage type to deal as part of making each Strike.
Effect: Energy Shot.name: Effect: Energy Shot

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a divination, enchantment or illusion spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 mental damage.
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental)

Effect: Bone Spikes.description: You can make bone spike unarmed Strikes, which deal 1d6 piercing damage and have the versatile S and sweep traits.
Effect: Bone Spikes.name: Effect: Bone Spikes

Effect: You're an Embarrassment.description: You reroll the triggering Will saving throw with a +1 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).description:
